mapper.select: SELECT id,title,writer,FORMATDATETIME(writedate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') as writeDate,FORMATDATETIME(modifydate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:MM') as modifyDate,content,category,count FROM post WHERE category = #{category} LIMIT #{count} OFFSET (#{page}-1) * #{count}

SELECT id,title,writer,FORMATDATETIME(writedate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') as writeDate,FORMATDATETIME(modifydate,'yyyy-MM-dd HH:MM') as modifyDate,content,category,count FROM post WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Post set title=#{title} ,writer = #{writer}, modifyDate=#{modifyDate}, content=#{content}, category = #{category} where id=#{id}
